about_the_game:
Wander alone or compete with your friend in a huge city

The game has no story or missions. Wander or compete alone or with your friend in the large interactive city.

7 modes

  • Just wandering   Wander around a slightly crazy town alone or with your friend.

  • Run there first   Compete who is the first in a certain place with or without the city map.

  • Drive there first   Drive randomly or compete to be the first to drive a car to a certain place.

  • Health hunt   Compete who picks up the most food/medicine in three minutes.

  • Player hunt   Each player in turn is chased by the other player.

  • Hiding hunt   Each player in turn hides inside a trash bag, a mail box etc in the streets.

  • Alient hunt   Shoot aliens or compete who shoots more aliens lurking on street corners.

The huge interactive city

You find the city is both huge and very interactive - it is full of interiors, shops, restaurants, offices, apartments and other places to visit, explore or compete.

There are thousands (about 4,000) of objects in the city that can be used, picked up, eaten or just thrown, most objects behave physically - with one click of the mouse. You can even use an ATM - you have 'money' in your account to spend in the city. Travel by bus or subway, ride a scooter or even catch an alien hoverboard !

See funny or even crazy aspects of citizens' lives, businesses, activities and hobbies when visiting their homes and workplaces - most doors are open.

Find references to famous movies, popular culture and even history of mankind.

Special activities

You can also change the texture of many posters and ads in the city just by clicking on it.

There is also 3D modelled computers all over the city with fully functional browsers that can be operated directly in the game's 3D space.

Hosting

The first player hosts the game and the second player joins that host computer.

name: City Multi Fun

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400/AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Adventure alone or with your friend in a highly interactive city. Six competition modes and just wandering mode. Drive cars, shoot aliens, search for food or places. Hide yourself inside funny objects and let your friend find you etc. Communicate with automatic voice chat.
